title: Advanced Financial Literacy Education Program for University Students Aged 40+

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational financial knowledge and financial management experience based on social experience
context.additional_context: Self-Directed Learning Structure Using Digital Devices, Providing Real-Life Application-Centered Educational Content

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the structure and risk factors of complex financial products (e.g., derivatives, pension products)
Learners can comprehensively diagnose their personal financial status and establish long-term financial plans of five years or more
Learners can apply advanced financial strategies such as tax optimization and credit management to real-world situations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
